title: 2-year-old boy fighting for his life after accidental shooting
content:
TARRANT, AL (WBRC) -
A 2-year-old boy is fighting for his life after being shot while his father was cleaning a gun on Saturday night, according to Tarrant police.
Police say the accidental shooting happened around 6:44 p.m. on May 2 at a home in the 700 block of Bell Avenue.
The child was taken to Children's of Alabama in Birmingham and rushed into surgery on Saturday night, Tarrant police Lt. Larry Rice said.
The toddler's injuries are still considered life-threatening and serious as of 6 a.m. Monday, May 4.
Police are still investigating the shooting, which they believe was accidental.
